Polash Ahsan Habib

Kyoto University, Graduate School of medicine · personal gmail · institutional mail

By training I am a molecular biologist. In my doctoral study I became interested in cheminformatics, medicinal chemistry, computational chemistry, computational toxiciology and computational biology

This is a lab under Department of Molecular Biosciences. Here I Started working in the field of cheminformatics and later I decided to pursue for my doctoral study
